metadata.title: CVE-2023-40094 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In keyguardGoingAway of ActivityTaskManagerService.java, there is apossible lock screen bypass due to a missing permission check. This couldlead to local escalation of privilege with no additional executionprivileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.

criterions.comment: android-framework-23: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
android-platform-frameworks-base: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
